- Directly to the left (row 10, col 12) is a floor tile ('.').

- There are no hazards immediately next to the avatar, but the piranha is present at (row 1, col 5), (row 1, col 8), and (row 1, col 11).

Given that the avatar should move to avoid falling into a hole or being killed by the piranha while also strategizing to collect items and remove boxes, the best planned action would be to move left towards the open space. 

I will choose to move left. 

``` Action: 1 ``` 

This movement will allow me to reposition the avatar safely and potentially explore other options next turn.

- To the left (row = 10, col = 11) is another empty floor space ('.'), while to the right (row = 10, col = 13) is where the avatar just moved from.
- Below (row = 11, col = 12) is a wall ('w').

Since the next possible actions are to continue moving left, right, or using up and down directions (but up is blocked by walls), I can consider moving further left (row = 10, col = 11), which is still safe and will potentially reveal more of the map, including more collectible coins.
